short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for compress/decompress string using base64+deflate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zlib Compressor let user compress or decompress a string quickly. The "Compress" button transforms content of upper textfield using zlib deflate and base64 encode algorithm and puts result in the lower textfield. The "Decompress" button transforms content of lower textfield using base64 decode and zlib inflate algorithm and puts result in the upper textfield. The clipboard buttons improve UX and let user copy/paste strings from/into textfields just by one click.
